CustomField.description: Used to provide increased information to better inform the team when creating inbound content.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Always keep in mind the value of similar blogs & pages when planning a topic. If the values are too similar then our content runs the risk of duplicating content and self-cannibalization. Answer to the question â€œwhy would someone read this blog/page? What information, insight, or industry knowledge are we providing in this topic to support our goal?
CustomField.label: Value
